title: FS - T-206 Cobb Red Background w/Piedmont Back SGC 50 Free Shipping

posts.post_title: FS - T-206 Cobb Red Background w/Piedmont Back SGC 50 Free Shipping
posts.post_content: I'm starting to clear out my lifetime collection (first show in 1973 at the Troy Hilton). This is a T-206 Ty Cobb red background graded SGC 50 (4) with a Piedmont back. I'm keeping the price reasonable at $7,500 and will not lower it. FREE SHIPPING
